app.name: MyFit
login.offline: You are offline. Please check your internet connection.
login.registerSuccess: Registration successful! Please complete your profile.
login.error: An error occurred while signing in
login.welcomeDescription: Sign in to access your fitness journey
login.otpDescription: Enter your email below to receive an OTP for login
login.otpCodeDescription: Enter the 6-digit code sent to your email.
login.otpSentSuccess: OTP sent! Please check your email.
login.otpSendError: An error occurred while sending the OTP
login.otpVerifyError: An error occurred while verifying the OTP
account.title: Account
settings.title: Settings
themeSwitcher.title: Color mode
themeSwitcher.description: Select the color mode for the app
localeSwitcher.label: Language
localeSwitcher.description: Select the language for the app
legal.consentIntro: By continuing to use MyFit, you agree to the following
dashboard.betaDescription:
This build is for UI and feature validation only. Data models may change and entries can be wiped between updates. Do not use this as your primary macro tracker.

If you're here, feedback > perfection. Thanks for testing.
foodDiary.metricsDescription: Your bodyweight, height, and other metrics
foodDiary.activityDescription: Daily energy expenditure and activity tracking
foodDiary.targetsDescription: Set your targets: weight change and macro ratios
foodDiary.scanBarcodeDescription: Select a camera and point it at a barcode
foodDiary.searchFoodsEmptyDescription: Type in the search box above to find foods to add to your diary
foodDiary.searchingDescription: Fetching foods that match your search
foodDiary.noFoodsFoundDescription: Try another search or add the food manually
foodDiary.noItemFoundForCode: No item found for this code
foodDiary.noFoodFoundDescription: Food with this code couldn't be found. Try some other options?
foodDiary.nutritionEditDescription: Edit nutrition for this entry only, original food will remain unchanged.
foodDiary.nutritionAllValuesPerHundred: All values are per 100g of the food
foodDiary.nutritionFormErrors: There are errors in the form
foodDiary.notes.formLabel: The first feature we're working on is the food diary. This will allow you to track your meals and calories throughout the day.
foodDiary.notes.healthConnect: Syncs activity with Android HealthConnect and Apple HealthKit
foodDiary.notes.database: Large database of foods and nutrition information
foodDiary.initializingCameraDescription: Please wait while we set up the camera for barcode scanning
errors.formInvalid: Please fix the errors in the form before logging
validation.errors: There are errors in the form
